channel.title: SonicForce41 Perm ban
channel.description:
This is an appeal for SonicForce41 being banned for "Spam bot".
Ready for my wall of text? Kay here we go.
----------------------------------- START OF WALL OF TEXT-------------------------------------- I was banned for Spaming this forum in 2 topics. One in Development team and Server Download. Techinically the reason should be for trolling, raging/flaming but anyways. I was banned for raging/flaming, in my opinion it would be expressing my feeling but, towards a stolen/leaked source and client. We provided alot of proof except the GNU licence which counted against us >.> . MoparScape was the first RSPS community that i joined and had loads of fun time. but now it is filled with trolls and most of the mature people quit from here, including me. I decided to check this site after months and found the leaked source link. I was outraged and decided to post. Another developer, Apache Ah64, was more aggressive and threatned to attack the ISP. I represent me only and not someone else so to take frustration out on me is a serious bullshit tbh. I know this community is on a danger zone toward stability, love to help but with kind of attitude, im thinking otherwise. Asking for a unban or temp ban for 1 week. Permanant ban for spamming is too much. ------------------------------- END OF WALL OF TEXT ---------------------------------------
@Davidi2, "Shut up sonic" and infraction. Seriously bro? I like the Davidi2 from 3 years ago. Ever since you got power, you changed hell alot.

item.title: SonicForce41 Perm ban
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Never mind. Sorry for the troubles. SMF/Cookie issue.

item.title: SonicForce41 Perm ban
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“Shadow1442, post:1, topic:436158”]This is an appeal for SonicForce41 being banned for “Spam bot”.

Ready for my wall of text? Kay here we go.

----------------------------------- START OF WALL OF TEXT--------------------------------------
I was banned for Spaming this forum in 2 topics. One in Development team and Server Download.
Techinically the reason should be for trolling, raging/flaming but anyways.
I was banned for raging/flaming,
in my opinion it would be expressing my feeling but, towards a stolen/leaked source and client.
We provided alot of proof except the GNU licence which counted against us >.> .
MoparScape was the first RSPS community that i joined and had loads of fun time.
but now it is filled with trolls and most of the mature people quit from here, including me.
I decided to check this site after months and found the leaked source link. I was outraged and decided to post.
Another developer, Apache Ah64, was more aggressive and threatned to attack the ISP.
I represent me only and not someone else so to take frustration out on me is a serious bullshit tbh.
I know this community is on a danger zone toward stability, love to help but with kind of attitude, im thinking otherwise.
Asking for a unban or temp ban for 1 week. Permanant ban for spamming is too much.
------------------------------- END OF WALL OF TEXT ---------------------------------------

@Davidi2,
“Shut up sonic” and infraction. Seriously bro? I like the Davidi2 from 3 years ago. Ever since you got power, you changed hell alot.[/quote]
I think I found troll in his post. There are alot of mature people here and alot who quit.

Read full topic

item.title: SonicForce41 Perm ban
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Here’s an inside look at the ban log, you can see the name of the person in it. Censoring out other bans for obvious reasons.

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:16, topic:436158”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=538880.msg3943303#msg3943303 date=1331600596]
Uh, you aren’t banned?
[/quote]
LOL. (i am sorry david but that was funny to me)

Uh, you aren’t banned?

The log shows no bans at all with your name on them, and viewing your profile says you are not banned.

I did just ban someone else for being a spam bot (an actual spam bot, that was advertising nike shoes lol).

I’m guessing it’s just a SMF glitch, get a bit of information before flipping shit.

Maybe he is pissed at you for infracting him[/quote]He specifically said banned in the post quite a few times

My suggestions:
Clear your cookies completely.
Maybe try and restart your router (even though the ban log would show you as banned if your IP’s were linked).
Don’t flame a moderator for forum issues before learning about the situation.
And don’t blame me for your flaming, you spammed the entire thread, and there were multiple people that reported every single one of your posts in there. If you want to argue that infraction, check out the forum rules.

Read full topic

This conflict could have been avoided, keep that in mind

item.title: SonicForce41 Perm ban
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Shadow1442:

Is having separate identity illegal?

Technically yes, but we won’t get into that. But it’s really immature to pull the “is X innocent thing suddenly illegal now?” bit. It’s not illegal, but it’s in violation of the rules.

Read full topic

item.title: SonicForce41 Perm ban
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:4, topic:436158”]David can’t be held responsible for your own actions

Omg yay! I achieved the rank, “Funny BadAss”! Fking finally! Spent 2 days on that shit!

alright hun. dont rage at me when i bring your player count back to 9.
[/quote][quote author=sonicforce41 link=topic=538327.msg3941984#msg3941984 date=1331489992]
I cant find the logout button but you should unplug your power cord to your tower.
[/quote][quote author=sonicforce41 link=topic=538327.msg3941977#msg3941977 date=1331489688]

I’m not trolling, you guys are just pathetic, acting like you’re a badass because you can ‘crash’ a server.
#GrowTheFuckUp

#GetTheFuckOutOfThisThreadThen

Childish and rude comments. Can’t help it. Plus creating a new account, and making a pathetic thread is going to get you off the hook?
nuh-uh[/quote]
6 wrongs dont make a right.

Read full topic

item.title: SonicForce41 Perm ban
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

David can’t be held responsible for your own actions

Eclipse 667 Loading 706 -=Updated to 706 Revision=-

Omg yay! I achieved the rank, “Funny BadAss”! Fking finally! Spent 2 days on that shit!

Eclipse 667 Loading 706 -=Updated to 706 Revision=-

alright hun. dont rage at me when i bring your player count back to 9.[/quote][quote=“sonicforce41, post:58, topic:435605”]I cant find the logout button but you should unplug your power cord to your tower.

I’m not trolling, you guys are just pathetic, acting like you’re a badass because you can ‘crash’ a server.
#GrowTheFuckUp
[/quote]

#GetTheFuckOutOfThisThreadThen[/quote]
Childish and rude comments. Can’t help it. Plus creating a new account, and making a pathetic thread is going to get you off the hook?
nuh-uh

Your “main” account: November 27, 2008
this account: February 11, 2010
You really would have gotten banned for a along time

Read full topic
